data.title: Olga Kurylenko: ethnicity, husband, family, nationality, net worth
data.meta_description: OLGA KURYLENKO is a French actress and model. Check out this article to know more about her ethnicity, husband, height, family, nationality, and net worth.
data.text:
Models are the faces of the fashion industry. People might think their job is just sitting around looking pretty, but it's a harsh industry. It takes a strong person to take on the harsh world of fashion and still deliver a gorgeous photo at any given moment. Olga Kurylenko is one of the lovely models who, apart from modelling, has ventured into the film industry as an actress.

Olga Kurylenko is a famous French actress and model. She gained popularity for playing Bond's daughter, Camille Montes, in Quantum of Solace. She is also recognized for her appearances in Hitman, Seven Psychopaths, and Johnny English Strikes Again.

Olga Kurylenko's profile summary

Full name: Olga Kostyantynivna Kurylenko

Nickname: Olga Kurylenko

Gender: Female

Date of birth: 14th November 1979

Age: 42 years old (as of 2022)

Zodiac sign: Scorpio

Place of birth: Berdyansk, Zaporozhye Oblast, Ukrainian SSR, USSR

Current residence: London, England, United Kingdom

Nationality: French, Ukrainian

Ethnicity: Mixed-race

Religion: Christianity

Sexuality: Straight

Height in feet: 5'9''

Height in centimetres: 175

Weight in pounds: 117

Weight in kilograms: 53

Body measurements in inches: 34-24-35

Body measurements in centimetres: 86-61-89

Shoe size: 7 (US)

Dress size: 2 (US)

Bra size: 32B

Hair colour: Dark brown

Eye colour: Green

Mother: Maryna Alyabusheva

Father: Konstantyn Kurylenko

Marital status: Divorced

Ex-partner: (Cedric van Mol m. 2000; div. 2004 and Damian Gabrielle m. 2006; div. 2007)

Relationship status: Single

Children: One

Profession: Actress and model

Net worth: $18 million

Olga Kurylenko's biography

The actress was born on 14th November 1979 in Berdyansk, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union (now Ukraine). How old is Olga? She is 42 years old as of 2022. Her parents are Konstantin (father) and Marian Alyabusheva (mother).

Olga's parents divorced when she was only three years old. As a result, she was raised by a single mother. Is Olga Kurylenko white? No, she has a mixed racial background.

Her ethnicity is a mixture of Ukrainian, Belarusian, Russian, and Polish. The actress has not offered any information about her educational background.

Career

Olga relocated from Berdyansk to Moscow and later to Paris at 16 years. She began her modelling career in 1996 after signing a contract with the Paris-based Madison modelling agency. At 18 years, she appeared on the covers of Vogue and Elle magazines.

Kurylenko has appeared on the covers of Marie Claire and Madame Figaro magazines. She also became the face of various brands such as Bebe, Clarins, and Helena Rubinstein. In addition, she modelled for Roberto Cavalli and Kenzo and appeared in Victoria's Secret catalogue.

Besides modelling, Olga is a talented actress with various movies and TV show roles in her name. She made her television debut in 2001, starring as Carole in Largo Winch. On the other hand, she made her film debut in 2005, starring as Iris in L'Annulaire. Other movies and TV shows she has featured on include:

Movies

2005 - L'Annulaire as Iris

2006 - Paris, je t'aime as The Vampire

2006 - The Serpent as Sofia

2007 - Hitman as Nika Boronia

2008 - À l'est de moi as The Russian prostitute

2008 - Max Payne as Natasha Sax

2008 - Quantum of Solace as Camille Montes

2009 - Kirot (The Assassin Next Door) as Galia

2010 - Centurion as Etain

2011 - There Be Dragons as Ildiko

2011 - Land of Oblivion as Anya

2012 - Erased as Anna Brandt

2012 - To the Wonder as Marina

2012 - Seven Psychopaths as Angela

2013 - Oblivion as Julia Rusakova Harper

2014 - Vampire Academy as Ellen Kirova

2014 - The November Man as Alice Fournier/Mira Filipova

2014 - The Water Diviner as Ayshe

2015 - A Perfect Day as Katya

2015 - Momentum as Alex Farraday

2016 - The Correspondence as Amy

2017 - The Death of Stalin as Maria Yudina

2017 - Gun Shy as Sheila

2018 - Just a Breath Away (Dans la brume) as Anna

2017 - The Man Who Killed Don Quixote as Jacqui

2017 - Mara as Kate Fuller

2017 - Johnny English Strikes Again as Ophelia

2017 - The Emperor of Paris as Baroness Roxane of Giverny

2019 - L'Intervention as Jane Anderson

2019 - The Room as Kate

2019 - The Courier as The Courier

2019 - The Translators as Katerina Anisimova

2020 - The Bay of Silence as Rosalind

2021 - Sentinelle as Klara

2021 - Black Widow as Antonia Dreykov

2022 - The Vanishing as Alice

TBA - Empires of the Deep

TBA - White Elephant

TV shows

2001 - Largo Winch as Carole

2006 - Le porte-bonheur as Sophia

2007 - Suspectes as Eva Pirès

2010 - Tyranny as Mina Harud

2012 to 2013 - Magic City as Vera Evans

2014 - Mission Control as NASA broadcasting news

2020 - Wonderland, the girl from the shore as Alice

Awards and nominations

The star has received various accolades in her career. Some of them include:

2005 - Winner of the Brooklyn International Film Festival Awards for the Best Actress for her role in L'Annulaire

2008 - Nominee at the Saturn Awards for the Best Supporting Actress for her role in Quantum of Solace

2009 - Nominee at the Empire Awards for the Best Actress for her role in Quantum of Solace

2012 - Winner at the Boston Society of Film Critics Award for the Best Cast for her role in Seven Psychopaths

2012 - Nominee at the San Diego Film Critics Society Award for the Best Performance by an Ensemble for her role in Seven Psychopaths

Husband and children

Olga was first married to Cedric Van Mol, a French photographer. The duo tied the knot in 2000 but divorced after four years. Later, she married Damian Gabrielle, an American mobile phone accessory entrepreneur. The duo wedded in 2006 but divorced in late 2007.

Between 2012 and 2013, Olga dated Danny Houston, an American actor. After their break up, she started dating Max Benitz in 2014. They dated for three years and broke up in 2017. Max is an English writer, journalist and former film and TV actor.

In 2017, she started dating Ben Cura, an Argentine actor. Unfortunately, the relationship lasted only three years as they broke up in 2020. The duo separated due to conflicting schedules considering the nature of their jobs in the show business.

The actress has a son named Alexander Max Horatio. He was born on 3rd October 2015 from the model's former relationship with Max Benitz.

Body measurements

How tall is Olga Kurylenko? The model is 5 feet 9 inches tall. She weighs around 53 kg. Her body statistics are 34-24-35 inches for her breast, waist, and hips, respectively. She wears a dress size 2 (US) and a shoe size 7 (US). Olga has green eyes and dark brown hair.

Net worth

How much is Olga Kurylenko's net worth? The model has an estimated net worth of $18 million as of 2022. She has earned such an impressive sum of money from featuring in movies and TV shows. In addition, she has significantly earned from being the face of several prestigious brands.

Olga Kurylenko's fast facts

Who is Olga Kurylenko? She is a Ukrainian-born French-based model and actress.

How old is Olga Kurylenko? Olga is 42 years old as of 2022 since she was born on 14th November 1979.

What language does Olga Kurylenko speak? The actress speaks English, Ukrainian, French, Russian and Spanish.

Is Olga Kurylenko black? No, she has a mixed racial background.

Does Olga Kurylenko have an accent? Yes, she does, and as a result, her castmates on the James Bond film constantly made fun of her accent.

What is Olga Kurylenko's nationality? Olga has two nationalities; she is Ukrainian by birth and French by citizenship (acquired in 2001).

What are Olga Kurylenko's body measurements? She is 5 feet 9 inches tall and weighs 53 kg. Her other body measurements are 34-24-35 inches for her breast, waist and hips, respectively.

How much is Olga Kurylenko's net worth? The model has an estimated net worth of $18 million as of 2022.

Olga Kurylenko is neither a new name nor a new face in the entertainment sector. Thanks to her magnificent beauty and sensual character, she has been in the limelight since her debut in the show business. She is the epitome of hard work, discipline, diligence, and commitment to her career.

Tuko.co.ke shared an interesting article about Percy Gibson. He is a famous Peruvian-American producer who has worked on several popular shows. Some of his notable production roles include The Time of Their Lives and Banksy's Coming for Dinner.

Percy Gibson has risen from a humble beginning to become one of the most successful Peruvian-American producers in the film industry. This is all thanks to the production gigs he has landed since he debuted his film production career.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
